title: How-To: Filtering on Multiple Timestamps
description:
Explores queries that need to consider more than one timestamp field, such as event time
versus ingestion time, or start and end times in range records.

examples.name: Filter by event_time and ingestion_time
examples.description: Keeps only events where event_time is within the last 24h and ingestion_time is within 1h of event_time.
